channel.description: CC 410 - Week 4 Wrapping Up 2/7 - Documentation, Testing, UML 2/7 - Doc & Testing Example 2/7 - Restaurant 2 This Week 2/14 - Inheritance & Polymorphism 2/14 - Inheritance Example Start - Stop - Continue Survey Some Final Project Time Next Week 2/21 - Debugging & Logging 2/21 - Lambda Expressions 2/21 - Debugging & Logging Example 2/21 - Restaurant 3 2/25 - Final Project 2 Milestone 3 All General Requirements Add Inheritance Refactor Classes New Unit Tests Update UML Diagram ~1500 LOC Feedback Welcome!
